N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 56.9 - Front crossing control arms on certain school buses

State Regulations
(a) Notwithstanding any provisions of
sections
375
and
385
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law, the use of a front crossing control arm shall be
permitted on school buses painted national school bus chrome. (b) A front crossing control arm shall only
be activated while the vehicle is stopped and engaged in picking up or
discharging pupils and shall be used only in accordance with the directions of
the Commissioner of Education. Notes
